scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run buildserver && npm run buildclient
scripts.package: npm run packageprep && cp -r ./server/dist/* ./dist && cp -r ./server/node_modules/ ./dist/node_modules && cp -r ./client/build/ ./dist/public && cp -r ./server/public/* ./dist/public
scripts.updateprod: rm -rf /var/www/html/default && mkdir /var/www/html/default && mv dist/* /var/www/html/default && pm2 restart gdk-server
